com.drgarbage.controlflowgraph.figures

Class BentCornerFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.draw2d.Figure
      • com.drgarbage.controlflowgraph.figures.BentCornerFigure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommentFigure

    public class BentCornerFigure
extends org.eclipse.draw2d.Figure
    A figure that has a bent corner in the top right hand. Typically used for sticky notes.
    Version:
    $Revision: 187 $ $Id: BentCornerFigure.java 187 2013-06-03 05:47:37Z salekseev $
    Author:
    Sergej Alekseev

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_CORNER_SIZE
      The default amount of pixels subtracted from the figure's height and width to determine the size of the corner.
